item.title: 随着全国麻疹病例的增加，芝加哥已成为美国最新的疫情中心城市。
item.description:
As the number of measles cases increases across the country, Chicago has become the latest U.S. city to be at the center of an outbreak. https://t.co/LrlnbyueV4

item.title: 一个强大的房地产贸易集团已同意取消数十年来帮助确定经纪人佣金的政策，以解决声称这些规则迫使人们支付人为抬高的卖房成本的诉讼。
item.description:
A powerful real estate trade group has agreed to do away with policies that for decades helped set agent commissions, moving to resolve lawsuits that claim the rules have forced people to pay artificially inflated costs to sell their homes. https://t.co/Auz7lOinOZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 一项新的分析显示，美国一些州向当地水道排放的工业活动产生的化学废物要比其他州多得多。
item.description:
Some U.S. states are discharging much more chemical waste from industrial activity into local waterways than others, according to a new analysis. https://t.co/OMGuALIoRc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 美国移民和海关执法局的律师告诉 @ABC 新闻，因一名佛罗里达州警官死亡而被捕的危地马拉移民 Virgilio Aguilar Mendez 已被释放。
item.description:
Virgilio Aguilar Mendez, the teen migrant from Guatemala who was arrested following the death of a Florida police officer, has been freed from U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement's custody his lawyers told @ABC News. https://t.co/Kw7Ns7brtX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 17, 2024

item.title: 官员称，一架波音 737-800 飞机在抵达俄勒冈州南部的目的地后，在飞行后检查中发现一块面板缺失。
item.description:

item.title: "他们做着普通的事情......却碰巧与连环杀手擦肩而过"。从悬案到关联案件连环杀手与五起袭击案有关

item.description:

item.title: 缅因州大规模枪击事件调查委员会发布的初步临时报告称，有 "几次 "错失了采取行动的机会，而这些行动 "可能会改变事件的进程"，并有可能避免有人丧生。
item.description:
The initial interim report released by the commission investigating the Maine mass shooting said there were "several" missed opportunities to take action that "may have changed the course of events," and could have potentially prevented lost lives. https://t.co/7ILpr4lILi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 并非所有动物物种都因全球气温变暖而受到不利影响。研究人员称，20 年间公牛鲨的数量大幅增加，海水变暖是罪魁祸首。
item.description:
Not all animal species are experiencing a detrimental effect due to warming global temperatures.

The number of bull sharks increased significantly in a 20-year period, and researchers say warmer seawater is to blame. https://t.co/5TNK37uIJD pic.twitter.com/RBCx3ZjirO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: "你们为我和我的家人所做的一切真的很了不起"。前 UFC 冠军马克-科尔曼（Mark Coleman）在医院康复期间对自己还活着感到 "幸运和感激"，几天前他的家人说他曾帮助父母从家中的火灾中获救。
item.description:
"What you have done for me and my family is truly remarkable."

Former UFC champion Mark Coleman is "blessed and grateful" to be alive while recovering in the hospital, days after his family said he helped rescue his parents from a fire at their home. https://t.co/g6ZeUj68Yz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 成千上万的观众观看了芝加哥河在圣帕特里克节被染成绿色，这一传统可以追溯到 1962 年。芝加哥水管工工会在河里注入了 50 磅绿色染料，他们保证不会伤害野生动物。
item.description:
Thousands of spectators watched as the Chicago River was dyed green for St. Patrick’s Day, a tradition that dates back to 1962.
The Chicago Plumbers Union infused the river with 50 pounds of green dye, which they reassured would not harm wildlife.https://t.co/vXY2xScqDq pic.twitter.com/vXs7poqK6m

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 众议员劳伦-博伯特（Lauren Boebert）在争取继续担任国会议员的过程中走着最狭窄的钢丝绳，但她的竞选团队警告说，现在还不能将她排除在外。
item.description:
Rep. Lauren Boebert is walking the narrowest of tightropes as she campaigns to remain in Congress — but operatives warn against writing her off just yet. https://t.co/3o0HBnLFXE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 公牛鲨是世界上最具攻击性的鲨鱼物种之一，其数量在 20 年间大幅增加，研究人员称，海水变暖是罪魁祸首。
item.description:
The number of bull sharks — one of the most aggressive species of shark in the world — increased significantly in a 20-year period, and researchers say warmer seawater is to blame. https://t.co/rCXn1seDLw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 本周末，德克萨斯州南部将受到恶劣天气的威胁，圣安东尼奥、奥斯汀和休斯顿等城市都将受到强风暴的影响。这些城市可能会出现破坏性大风和零星龙卷风，并有山洪暴发的风险。
item.description:
A severe weather threat is impacting southern Texas this weekend with cities like San Antonio, Austin and Houston all in the zone for powerful storms. The cities could see damaging winds and scattered tornadoes and there is a risk of flash flooding. https://t.co/QQhZn6ridu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 女同性恋、男同性恋、双性恋和变性者青少年奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在高中厕所打斗后死亡，现已被判定为自杀，俄克拉荷马州学校日益恶化的环境和反女同性恋、男同性恋、双性恋和变性者的欺凌行为再次成为人们关注的焦点。
item.description:
The death of LGBTQ teen Nex Benedict following a fight in a high school restroom has been ruled a suicide, shining a renewed spotlight on the intensifying environment in Oklahoma schools and anti-LGBTQ bullying. https://t.co/iFP4gopF4O pic.twitter.com/jPHlBBDHt7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 纽约州官员说，在纽约州北部一户非法饲养鳄鱼的人家中，缴获了一条患病的11英尺长的鳄鱼。

item.title: "今天我的心碎了...我简直不敢相信"。名模兼演员卡拉-迪瓦伊（Cara Delevingne）在加利福尼亚州工作室城的家被烧毁后悲痛欲绝。目前，火灾原因正在调查中。
item.description:
"My heart is broken today... I cannot believe it." Model and actress Cara Delevingne is devastated after her Studio City, California, home burned down. The cause of the fire is currently under investigation. https://t.co/YzcK94lbyj pic.twitter.com/MUaa6mWEGn

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 周六，俄罗斯各地的选民在选举的第二天进行了投票，选举将正式确定弗拉基米尔-普京总统再掌权六年。
item.description:
Voters across Russia cast ballots Saturday on the second day of an election set to formalize six more years of power for President Vladimir Putin, who faces no serious challengers after crushing political dissent over his nearly quarter-century of rule. https://t.co/zwgqiIJvZE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 据他的业务经理证实，他是一位登山家、作家和电影制片人，曾在 1998 年联合执导和制作了一部关于攀登珠穆朗玛峰的 IMAX 纪录片。享年 68 岁。
item.description:
A mountaineer, author and filmmaker who co-directed and co-produced a 1998 IMAX documentary about climbing Mount Everest has died, his business manager confirmed. He was 68. https://t.co/eqknAaswMo

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 在奈克斯-本尼迪克特去世后，@ABC 新闻采访了他以前的学生和当地的家长，他们表示，反 LGBTQ 政策和言论的影响在俄克拉荷马州的学校中日益受到关注，比如本尼迪克特曾经就读的奥瓦索高中（Owasso High School）。
item.description:
After Nex Benedict's death, @ABC News spoke with former students and local parents, who say that the impact of anti-LGBTQ policy and rhetoric is a growing concern in Oklahoma schools like Owasso High School, where Benedict was a student. https://t.co/jdeUsw2M67

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 更新：警方称，周六在宾夕法尼亚州福尔斯镇发生了一起明显有针对性的枪击案，造成三人死亡，一名 "极度危险 "的嫌疑人在逃。
item.description:
UPDATE: An "extremely dangerous" suspect is at large after three people were killed in apparently targeted shootings in Falls Township, Pennsylvania, on Saturday, police say. https://t.co/ioXfApaJiW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024

item.title: 作为濒危物种繁育计划的一部分，英国一家动物园迎来了一头南方白犀牛的诞生，动物园称这头小犀牛是 "巨大的喜悦"。
item.description:
A zoo in the U.K. welcomed the birth of a southern white rhinoceros as part of an endangered species breeding program, describing the calf as a “giant bundle of joy.” https://t.co/DVe2gH7KeY pic.twitter.com/oVyQiaqW7c

— ABC News (@ABC) March 16, 2024
